pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: CPU 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Whatever
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Window compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Whatever
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Window compatible soundcard
